entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unify usage pattern of obsolete gettimeofday #99206
  • [API Proposal]: Replace `TFrom : struct` constraint on `Unsafe.BitCast` with a dynamic check #99205
    9.0.0
  • System.Text.Json: [JsonSourceGenerationOptions(DefaultIgnoreCondition = JsonIgnoreCondition.WhenWritingNull)] fails with string type prop #99202

Closed

  • CallSiteValidator doesn't cache results of the walk #96253
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Some System.Decimal performance improvements #99212
    needs-area-label
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add AW_2A to AZ_2A, BM_1A, BN_1A #99211
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove the local morph quirk with block locals #99209
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT/ARM] Avoid generating (most) thunks #99208
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT/ARM] Fix handling of stack adjustments in prolog/epilog #99207
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [QUIC] Try every ip address on host connection #99204
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • CI test #99201
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make delegates immutable #99200
    area-VM-coreclr

Merged

  • More SearchValues<string> tests #99197
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0
  • Make FailFast a QCall #98908
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution

Updated

  • Preserve all InternalsVisibleTo attributes in ILLink Trimmer #98910
    community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • missing opportunities in constant folding around bitwise ops #99136
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Do not contain out-of-bounds local addresses #99195
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Delegate bug fixes #99185
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add BFloat16 #98643
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • set scope and build validation in dev when no options provided #99199
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Mention NetFx40_LegacySecurityPolicy for PublicSign #99184
    area-Meta
  • Fix the Syndication Feed RFC822 DateTimeParser #99194
    area-System.ServiceModel.Syndication
  • ILCompiler: support publishing using a non-portable ILCompiler build. #99148
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] OSR: Fix initReg usage in genPushCalleeSavedRegisters #99156
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • Disable optimizations for b425314.dll test #99170
    NO-MERGE, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Replace FEATURE_EH_FUNCLETS in JIT with runtime switch #99191
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Experiment[Draft]- please do not review #99143
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ActivatorUtilities.CreateInstance() should respect [ActivatorUtilitiesConstructor] #99175
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Add overview of runtime logging to the Book of the Runtime #98881
    documentation, area-Meta, runtime-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Missing tag for v8.0.201 #39164
  • NETSDK1064: Package Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Analyzers, version 7.0.2 was not found #39163
  • Getting the error CS0103 The name 'paramName' does not exist in the current context in terminal but not in IDE #39162

Closed

  • dotnet workload update seems to do a lot of stuff #38953

PullRequests

Created

  • Trim trailing .git from sourcelink repo urls in container generation #39161
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Add an image digest label to generated containers #39160
    untriaged, Area-Containers

Updated

  • Use unique names for aliasing test packages #39144
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Issue #37237 #19650] Dotnet Cli Feature: `dotnet tool update --all` Updating all tools with one command #38996
    untriaged, Area-Tools

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-03
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: String/Character escape sequence `\e` as a short-hand for `\u001b` (`<ESCAPE>`) #7400
    Any Time
  • [Proposal]: Collection Expressions Next (C#13 and beyond) #7913

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Run code clean up with "Fix all warnings and errors set in EditorConfig" ignores sort_system_directives_first = false #72376
  • Refactor suggestion: Remove unnecessary (value As String) in VB.NET property setters #72373
  • IntelliSense suggests the `readonly` modifier even when it's already present in the incomplete declaration #72372
    Backlog

Closed

  • Improper IDE0004 Cast is Redundant Suggestion for Delegates Conversion #62072
    Backlog
  • Cannot get the size of a value tuple in the expression evaluator in the debugger #62776
    17.6 P3

PullRequests

Created

  • WIP: Attempt at reducing the file I/O under the AnalyzerAssemblyLoader folder. #72377
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • WIP: Reduce allocations required to create a TransformNode #72375
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Updated

  • Reduce closure and Lazy allocations inside CSharpCompilation.ctor #72371
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Extend ISessionStore to enable fetching a list of all sessions #54331
  • Reduce Polyfill packages for newer TFM #54330
  • Avoid the evaluation of policies if authentication not succeeded #54329
  • Perf improvement: json, updates #54327
  • Minimal API does not return ProblemDetails traceid on Exception #54325
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #54323

Closed

  • ASP.NET Core 7 project takes long time on first load in production #54226
  • Perf improvement: plaintext, plainTextSansFilter #54322
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #54319
  • Perf regression: json #54270
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps #54318

PullRequests

Updated

  • Treating empty string in form post as null for nullable value types #52499
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • [Blazor] InputBase - SetCurrentValueAsync + SetCurrentValueAsStringAsync (fix for #44105) #54279
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Add missing TimeProvider registration #53946
    area-identity, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0-preview2
  • JSInterop: Enable returning null for a nullable value type #52908
    area-blazor, stale, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun
